titleStmt.title: A proclamation prohibiting the payment and receipt of customes, and other maritime duties upon the late pretended ordinance of both Houses of Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: By the King.
"Given under our signe manuall at our court at Oxford, the sixteenth day of December, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
